product_overview: Nine Hub Tools is a free, professional-grade suite of nine design and utility tools tailored for modern web developers. It streamlines creative workflows by offering customizable visual effects, accessibility checking, SEO optimization, and AI prompt generation, all within a responsive, theme-aware web platform.
core_goals: Provide a comprehensive set of design utilities specifically optimized for web developers.
Enable users to create, customize, and export visually compelling UI effects and assets.
Facilitate web accessibility compliance and SEO best practices through specialized tools.
Support seamless user workflows with favorites, presets, export history, and quick navigation features.
Ensure a modern, responsive, and accessible user experience with dark/light themes and keyboard shortcuts.
key_features: Nine distinct tools including Glassmorphism Generator, Color Palette Generator, Gradient Text Generator, Box Shadow Generator, Blob Generator, CSS Grid Generator, Contrast Checker, Meta Tags Generator, and AI Prompt Generator.
Favorites system for bookmarking frequently used tools for quick access.
Presets management allowing users to save and reload customized configurations per tool.
Export history tracking that records all user exports for easy reference and reuse.
Full dark and light mode theme support with automatic switching.
Command Palette activated via Cmd/Ctrl+K for rapid navigation between tools.
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop devices.
Comprehensive SEO optimization with meta tags, sitemap, and structured data.
Backend subscription system integration using Supabase for user management.
user_flow_summary: User lands on a homepage showcasing available tools, feature highlights, and pricing info.
User browses or searches tools, using the command palette (Cmd/Ctrl+K) for quick navigation.
User selects a tool and customizes its parameters using intuitive controls (e.g., blur and opacity for Glassmorphism).
User saves customized settings as presets for future reuse or stars the tool as a favorite for easy access.
User exports generated assets (CSS styles, SVG shapes, meta tags, or prompt templates) and the export is logged in history.
User toggles between dark and light themes; the app automatically respects system theme preferences.
User manages subscriptions and account settings through integrated backend services.
User accesses help or contribution information via footer links and documentation resources.
validation_criteria: All nine tools function correctly with expected input and output behaviors and support live preview and export.
Favorites system accurately persists user starred tools and retrieves them on reload.
Presets can be saved, loaded, and deleted without errors across tools.
Export history properly records each export with relevant details and allows users to manage entries.
Theme toggling works seamlessly with automatic detection and manual override.
Command palette opens with keyboard shortcut and navigates correctly between all tools and main pages.
Responsive design displays correctly and is fully operational on devices of various screen sizes.
SEO components generate correct meta tags and sitemap conforming to best practices.
Subscription backend operations via Supabase work reliably including user state management and session handling.

features.name: Glassmorphism Generator
features.description: Create stunning frosted glass effects with customizable blur, opacity, and border settings

features.description: Generate harmonious color schemes with multiple palette options and export capabilities

features.description: Design eye-catching text gradients with color customization and CSS export

features.name: Box Shadow Generator
features.description: Perfect shadows for UI elements with multiple shadow layers and customization

features.description: Create organic shapes for modern designs with SVG export capabilities

features.description: Visual grid layout builder with gap, columns, and row customization

features.name: Contrast Checker
